page.title: 10HOUSING/WORK IN WALDERSLADE.
page.content: {Doctor's Surgery:}there were three doctors and two receptionists.Each doctor has about 2,810 patients.Before it was a surgery it was just a plot of land. {The Dentist:}the dentist has been open for nineteen years.Before that it was a private house,which is in King George Road.A road leading off this road is Meadow Close.House number thirteen was missed out because it is unlucky.We asked some questions and these are the results:A man who has lived in the area for 75 years said that there were no buses, just trams and coaches.He also said that if anyone lost a job they could get a new one the next day. {House Types:}most of the houses are either terraced or semi-detached with some being detached or bungalows. . {Travel:}most people travel by buses.
